mdRecord.dcterms:description: Founded in 1881, it was the first institution of higher learning in the Dakota Territory. Yankton College closed in December 1984, and its campus became the site of Federal Prison Camp, Yankton which opened four years later. -- http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Yankton_College The first building constructed for the college. -- Grow and Varvel, Yankton, South Dakota in Vintage Postcards, 2004 [work]
